lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00]My Love
[00:04.29]Westlife
[00:07.57]
[00:09.17]An empty street
[00:10.70]An empty house
[00:12.44]A hole inside my heart
[00:15.72]I'm all alone
[00:17.42]And the rooms are getting smaller
[00:22.32]I wonder how
[00:24.04]I wonder why
[00:25.64]I wonder where they are
[00:28.96]The days we had
[00:30.64]The songs we sang together (oh yeah)
[00:35.63]And oh my love
[00:39.08]I'm holding on forever
[00:42.48]Reaching for a love that seems so far
[00:48.38]So I say a little prayer
[00:51.54]And hope my dreams will take me there
[00:54.86]Where the skies are blue
[00:57.42]To see you once again, my love
[01:01.53]Over seas from coast to coast
[01:04.76]To find the place I love the most
[01:08.14]Where the fields are green
[01:10.79]To see you once again,my love
[01:17.20]
[01:19.11]I try to read
[01:20.68]I go to work
[01:22.38]I'm laughing with my friends
[01:25.66]But I can't stop to keep myself from thinking (oh no)
[01:32.42]I wonder how
[01:34.07]I wonder why
[01:35.73]I wonder where they are
[01:38.97]The days we had
[01:40.70]The songs we sang together (oh yeah)
[01:45.77]And oh my love
[01:49.09]I'm holding on forever
[01:52.40]Reaching for a love that seems so far
[01:58.38]So I say a little prayer
[02:01.74]And hope my dreams will take me there
[02:05.12]Where the skies are blue
[02:07.34]To see you once again,my love
[02:11.76]Over seas from coast to coast
[02:15.04]To find the place I love the most
[02:18.39]Where the fields are green
[02:20.77]To see you once again
[02:24.11]To hold you in my arms
[02:27.46]To promise you my love
[02:30.70]To tell you from the heart
[02:34.17]You're all I'm thinking of
[02:39.27]
[02:45.19]Reaching for a love that seems so far[02:51.20](So) So I say a little prayer
[02:55.07]And hope my dreams will take me there
[02:58.40]Where the skies are blue
[03:00.69]To see you once again, my love
[03:05.15]Over seas from coast to coast
[03:08.44]To find the place I love the most
[03:11.72]Where the fields are green
[03:14.02]To see you once again...my love

[03:22.58]Dreams will take me there
[03:24.48]Where the skies are blue (oh yeah)
[03:27.52]To see you once again     (oh my love)

[03:35.14]To find the place I love the most
